title: Bug 117981: Unable to select any item in library outline view on the first attempt
description: Description: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view, it is not possible to do so on the first attempt. Instead, the focus automatically jumps to the library file node. Steps to reproduce: 1.
OB: When trying to select an item in the library outline view, the focus jumps to the library file node instead of allowing the selection.
EB: On the second attempt to select the item, it can be successfully selected.
